tier.item: (8) (a) Nci fiat abbarradu male meda una borta chi algunos piciocos [...] dd'iant pigadu
`He had been so bad once when some children [...] had been pulling his leg for a
(8) (a) Nci fiat abbarradu male meda una borta chi algunos piciocos [...] dd'iant pigadu
`He had been so bad once when some children [...] had been pulling his leg for a
Nci fiat abbarradu male meda una borta chi algunos piciocos [...] dd'iant pigadu in giru pro meda tempus.
He had been so bad once when some children [...] had been pulling his leg for a long time.

`some newspaper said that they had surely put the bomb there for the articles that
(b) calicunu diariu naràat chi de seguru sa bomba bi l'aìant posta pro sos artìculos chi
`some newspaper said that they had surely put the bomb there for the articles that
calicunu diariu naràat chi de seguru sa bomba bi l'aìant posta pro sos artìculos chi aìat iscritu

`Now I am a bit out of money, however, when I get some Euros I'll call you!'

tier.item: (e) A pustis de calincunu mesi, una busca scentìfiga fata de un'enti corsicanu agàtat,
in s'erba-àliga de a sut''e mari, una cantidadi de tòriu (cosa arradiu-ativa).
`After some months, a scientific search performed by an official Corsican entity
finds, among the algae under the sea, a quantity of thorium (a radio-active
(e) A pustis de calincunu mesi, una busca scentìfiga fata de un'enti corsicanu agàtat,
in s'erba-àliga de a sut''e mari, una cantidadi de tòriu (cosa arradiu-ativa).
`After some months, a scientific search performed by an official Corsican entity
finds, among the algae under the sea, a quantity of thorium (a radio-active
A pustis de calincunu mesi, una busca scentìfiga fata de un'enti corsicanu agàtat, in s'erba-àliga de a sut''e mari, una cantidadi de tòriu (cosa arradiu-ativa).
After some months, a scientific search performed by an official Corsican entity finds, among the algae under the sea, a quantity of thorium (a radio-active substance).
(18)(a) Podeus scriri de sa Sardìnnia, aici comenti de calisisiat atru logu, in calisiollat
`We may write about Sardinia, just like about whatever/any other place, in
(18)(a) Podeus scriri de sa Sardìnnia, aici comenti de calisisiat atru logu, in calisiollat
`We may write about Sardinia, just like about whatever/any other place, in
(18)(a) Podeus scriri de sa Sardìnnia, aici comenti de calisisiat atru logu, in calisiollat lìngua de su mundu.
We may write about Sardinia, just like about whatever/any other place, in whatever/any language of he world.

(20)(a) Chi b'esseret calicunu indiosadu de mene, custu l'ischio; mi lu contabant sas
cumpanzas, ma non m'amento mancu su lumen issoro. (STD ­ BERN/Bern4.html)
`That someone was in love with me, this I knew; my friends were telling me so,
but I do not even remember their name.'

Movèin dae incùe e atraessèin sa Galilea, ma no cherìat chi calicunu l'aeret ischidu.
